item.title: Support
item.description:
Support This Website

Thank you for your interest in supporting our community platform! Your support helps us maintain and improve this resource for everyone.

Ways to Support

We’re working on setting up multiple ways for you to contribute. Check back soon for updates!

Coming Soon

  • Financial Support - Details coming soon
  • Share & Spread the Word - Details coming soon

More information will be added as we finalize our support options. Thank you for your patience and interest in supporting our community!

item.title: About
item.description:
About My Town Square

I created this site because I don’t have social media and wanted an easy way to see what events are happening around Bayonne, NJ that my family can attend.

Instead of scrolling through multiple sources or missing out on community activities, this calendar aggregates local events in one place, making it simple to discover what’s going on in our town.
